textBeforeTable: Testing Results There are no health based standards that EWG is using for this chemical Health Based Limits for tert-Butylbenzene Health Based and Legal Limits for tert-Butylbenzene NOTE: Each dot in the above graph represents one month. * Water utilities are noted as exceeding the legal limit if any test is above the maximum contaminant level (MCL). Most MCLs are based on annual averages so exceeding the MCL for one test does not necessarily indicate that the system is out of compliance.
